mapper.select: SELECT a.pur_order_id purOrderId, a.pur_order_code purOrderCode, a.pur_order_date purOrderDate, a.supplier_id supplierId, b.supplier_name supplierName, a.total_price totalPrice FROM pur_order a, pur_supplier b WHERE a.pur_order_id = #{purOrderId} AND a.supplier_id = b.supplier_id

SELECT b.pur_order_id purOrderId, b.pur_order_detail_id purOrderDetailId, b.item_id itemId, b.item_name itemName, b.item_type itemType, CONCAT(0 + CAST(b.pur_count AS CHAR),'（',b.pur_unit_name,'）') purCount, REPLACE(FORMAT(b.unit_price,4),',','') unitPrice, REPLACE(FORMAT(b.total_price,4),',','') totalPrice, os.stock_price stockPrice, b.batch_number batchNumber, b.expire_date expireDate, b.manufacture_date manufactureDate, c.unit_convert unitConvert, b.pur_count * c.unit_convert stockCount, c.stock_unit_name stockUnitName, c.abbr_pinyin abbrPinyin, c.full_pinyin fullPinyin FROM pur_order_detail b, item_purchase c, ( SELECT o.item_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT s.selling_price SEPARATOR '，') stock_price FROM pur_order_detail o LEFT JOIN pur_stock s ON o.item_id = s.item_id AND o.pur_order_id = #{purOrderId} AND s.stock_state = 1 GROUP BY o.item_id ) os WHERE b.pur_order_id = #{purOrderId} AND b.item_id = os.item_id AND b.item_id = c.item_id AND b.item_type = c.item_type
